column4: can anyone (not living in China) confirm that the lxde repo is up? can you open "http://people.linux.org.tw/~pcman/ubuntu%20./ " in your browser?
i get a 404 error
works over here (Beijing)
really? i thought it is blocked because its in taiwan. maybe my iSP blocks it...
I can never figure out how they figure out what gets blocked
neither do i , i know some stuff is blocked at the ISP level...
but its strange that I get a 404 error ,usually when its blocked i get a server not found...
that url you gave me was funny, I chopped some stuff off then end though: try this http://people.linux.org.tw/~pcman/ubuntu/
i see , without the end bits i can open it here as well.
yep, usually if you get the 404 you're doing good -- timing out is bad =P
however is this post:http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=738958 the repo link is with the end bit but apt-get gives me a 404. i will try to chop the end in my sources.list and see
ah, that's because apt needs the end bits, but when using a browser, you have to chop off the " ./" at the end
i just learned that....but i still get a 404 with apt. strange
that is strange
let me give it a try and see what I get
thanks
i was apt-getting lxde
I'm having no problems with it
if you want to put your /etc/apt/sources.list file on the pastebin I'll take a look at it
thanks - i will try to apt-get update again and see if that helps
it works now , after apt-get update ....is that strange or what....
good :)
thanks for your help anyway....
no problem
